title: A Really Strange Storm Is Coming, Tornadoes, Hurricane Force Winds, Flash Flooding, and more..
author: Ryan Hall, Y'all
description:
Thanks for watching! 

In this video we are tracking a fast moving and #powerful #storm across the rockies and into the plains. #Heavy #snow, #hurricane force #wind gusts, and more #severe #weather will be possible. Beyond that, we’re looking at the #forecast for the entire US as the pattern looks more and more active… 

Join this channel to get access to perks and become an OFFICIAL StormSeeker!:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJHAT3Uvv-g3I8H3GhHWV7w/join
_____________________________________
Strange Storm Imminent: 0:00
Heat Wave & Flash Flooding: 8:38
Will We Ever See Any SNOW???: 11:10

localize.title: 本当に奇妙な嵐がやってくる！竜巻、ハリケーン並みの強風、鉄砲水などなど。
一场非常奇怪的风暴即将来临，龙卷风、飓风、山洪暴发，以及更多。
一場非常奇怪的風暴即將來臨，龍捲風、颶風、山洪暴發，以及更多。
